text: Brave Combat Federation is the largest mixed martial arts MMA promotion in the Middle East and the fastest growing global MMA promotion. The organization was established on 23 September 2016 by Sheikh Khalid bin Hamad Al Khalifa. BRAVE Combat Federation features mixed martial artists from more than 40 nations in five continents. BRAVE Combat Federation events are aired though multiple media partners including El Rey Network, Combate, Myx TV, S+A ESPN 5 and Bahrain Radio and Television Corporation.In July 2021, BRAVE Combat Federation was nominated for the first time as Promotion of the Year on the World MMA Awards. ==References== == Other websites == * Official BRAVE Combat Federation Site * Past to present event results and fighter records database Category:Mixed martial arts organizations Category:Mixed martial arts television programs Category:2016 establishments
title: Brave Combat Federation
